amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to protecting the Medicare Advantage program.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 590 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 590 proposed by Senator Rubio. (consideration: CR S1972-1973; text: CR S1973) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to protecting the Medicare Advantage program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 590 proposed by Senator Rubio.
